name: Second Coming of the Monarchs
desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY with 2400 ATK & 1000 DEF, or 2800 ATK & 1000 DEF; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but it has its effects negated, also equip it with this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy the equipped monster. The equipped monster can be treated as 2 Tributes for a Tribute Summon. You can only activate 1 "Second Coming of the Monarchs" per turn.
